summary: A team of police force escorts an alleged terrorist from Chandangarh to Mumbai. However their trip turns into a deadly survival when an ex-cop tries to stop them to reach Mumbai.
cast: Amitabh Bachchan|Akshay Kumar|Ajay Devgn|Aishwarya Rai Bachchan|Tusshar Kapoor|Atul Kulkarni|Jaya Prada|Prakash Raj|Sabyasachi Chakrabarty|D. Santosh|Kamlesh Sawant|Tanuja|Radhika Menon|Ashwini Kalsekar|Lara Dutta|Prasanna Ketkar|Susheel Jangira|Abir Goswami|Ashok Narayan|Arun Verma|Aashu Mohil|Arvind Parab|Ajit Apte|Ashok|Anameeka|Ashita Sawhney|Dileep Patwe|Deepak Kumar Bandhu|Deepak Desai|Ghanshyam Nayak|Guddu Nilesh Ozha|Harsh Soni|Iqbal Dosani|Juhi Jawaid|Kishore Nandlaskar|Kapil Sharma|Krishna|Madan Joshi|Mitwa|Navin Bhaskar|Narendra Rawal|Padam Singh|Pradeep Bajpai|Piyush Chakravorthy|Pawan Jain|Priya|Ravindra Mankani|Rakesh Oon|Ravi Kale|Ravi Sanghvai|Rajesh Tripathi|Ramesh Sharma|Rasika|Shish Khan|Sudhir Hema|Sanjay Sharma|Sunil Bob|Sameer Ali|Siddharth Hussain|Vivek Vaswani|Vijay Gawil|Vishal Saini|Vidula Juvekar|Yusuf Hussain|Niraj Sah|Surendra Rahi
title: Khakee
